alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Jefferson Davis; Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 25 at 8:01PM CST until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Nezpique Near Basile Mermentau River Near Mermentau For the Bayou Des Cannes...including Eunice...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Bayou Nezpique...including Basile...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Mermentau River...including Mermentau...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday evening at 815 PM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mermentau River near Mermentau. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 4.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding near the river will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CST Thursday the stage was 2.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Saturday afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 4.5 feet early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 4.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Mermentau River Mermentau 4.0 2.9 Thu 7 pm CST 3.5 4.1 4.4 &&
